metadata.title: CVE-2014-9882 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in drivers/media/radio/radio-iris.c in the Qualcommcomponents in Android before 2016-08-05 on Nexus 7 (2013) devices allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka Androidinternal bug 28769546 and Qualcomm internal bug CR552329.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
